turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey there, I'm looking for some dinner recommendations tonight. I'm really craving something comforting, but I'm also trying to avoid anything too greasy. What do you suggest?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Comfort food that isn't too greasy... how about some hearty soup and a fresh salad? Or perhaps some baked chicken with roasted vegetables? Are you looking for delivery or are you planning to go out?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Delivery would be best, definitely. Soup and salad sounds a bit light, though. I was thinking something more substantial. Like, maybe Italian or a good casserole type of dish? But seriously, no excessive oil. It's so annoying when you order comfort food and it's just swimming in grease.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand the frustration with greasy food. For delivery, Italian can be a great option. turns.speaker: agent
